titles.title: Behold the Glories of the Lamb

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Behold the glories of the Lamb amidst His Father's throne! amidst His Father's throne! Prepare new honors for His name, and songs before unknown, and songs before unknown.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Let elders worship at His feet, the church adore around, the church adore around, with vials full of odors sweet, and harps of sweeter sound, and harps of sweeter sound.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Thou hast redeemed our souls with blood, hast set the pris'ners free, hast set the prisoners free, hast made us kings and priests to God, and we shall reign with Thee, and we shall reign with Thee.
